---
title: IBM CANADA
author: ''
date: '2022-08-30'
slug: ibm_canada
categories: []
tags: []
r_init: |-
  
description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $514.2M
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with IBM CANADA. The average
  contract duration was 1.54 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $3.9M.
  The longest contract was 20.01 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $660.5M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '514.2M'
most_recent_fiscal_year_year: '2021-2022'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '1,026'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '205'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '20%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '1267%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2.53'
s433_total_amendment_increase_value_by_vendor: '473.9M'
s424_mean_duration_by_vendor: '1.54'
s421_mean_contract_value_by_vendor: '3.9M'
s425_max_duration_by_vendor: '20.01'
s422_max_contract_value_by_vendor: '660.5M'
---

</p>
